survey_name: Video Streaming Platform User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on their experience with video streaming platforms, including content preferences, usability, and satisfaction levels.

questions.question_text: Which video streaming platforms do you currently subscribe to?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple platforms. Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with checkbox inputs. Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which video streaming platforms do you currently subscribe to?

questions.question_text: How often do you use video streaming platforms per week?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with clear time ranges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you use video streaming platforms per week?

questions.question_text: What type of content do you most frequently watch on streaming platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple content types. Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with checkbox inputs.

script.question_text: What type of content do you most frequently watch on streaming platforms?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the video quality of your streaming platform(s)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with a 5-point Likert scale.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the video quality of your streaming platform(s)?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your streaming platform(s)?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to gather qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with a text area input.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your streaming platform(s)?
